team.name: Dan Scott
team.bioHtml: Pharmacist, growth marketer and journalist. Currently building a venture to tackle polypharmacy through Zinc VC in London.

jobs.title: COO/CoFounder
jobs.description:
As COO and co-founder of pepper, you will work directly with the CEO to set short term goals and long term objectives around how best to achieve our vision and mission. Key responsibilities will include: 

*  Implementing co-design and prototyping with key stakeholders (patients, primary care practices and charity partners) now and project management of upcoming pilots. 
* Managing business development and commercial initiatives.
* Setting company culture, values and hiring the first key time.
* Working as part of a multidisciplinary team and decision making with regards to product, marketing and strategy. 
* Attracting further key partners and assisting in the next round of grant and venture funding.
* Managing the governance and compliance with relation to data and confidentiality regulations.

**About you: **

* You have a proven track record in implementing new initiatives and change within healthcare/financial technology or systems with high throughput of data. 
* You’re passionate about making change in the healthcare dialogue with a patient-first mindset. 
* You’re a clear communicator with a sense of humour that can get sh1t done with careful prioritising and balance. 
* A clinical background is desirable. 

Informal queries before application are welcome!

jobs.title: CTO/CoFounder
jobs.description:
pepper has a vision of providing the first end to end precision medicine experience for patients with multiple morbidities. pepper's working backwards from the problem area of polypharmacy, where patients take at least five regular medicines. This cohort experience twice the likelihood of side effects, have complex care needs and only 15% of their medicines are taken correctly as intended. 

To start, pepper is currently piloting how to make the most out of the conversations between GPs, pharmacists and patients about the management of multiple chronic conditions across the Greater London area with charity partners and selected CCGs. 

pepper is currently supported by Zinc VC as part of their third mission to add five years of high quality to later life. We are actively building an advisory panel across data, technical and operational domains and beginning to make our first hires.

As CTO and co-founder of pepper, you are responsible for working with the product and data team to execute the technical requirements of our mission. 

Other key responsibilities will include: 
* Setting company culture, values and hiring for the first engineering team.
* Attracting further key partners and assisting in the next round of grant and venture funding.
* Working with academic and healthcare partners to maximise the research and development potential of future work and collaborations. 

**About you: **
* Ideally full stack with experience in systems integration/open APIs 
* Experience in health technology is desirable. 
* All hands and user centric approach to problem solving.
* Clear communicator and authentic leadership style to get the best out of your team. 


Informal queries before application are welcome!
